feed.title: The Journey of Xingyu ZHU
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my extraordinary journey captured in camera! Embark on an immersive adventure through captivating landscapes, vibrant cultures, and unforgettable moments frozen in time. Join me as I traverse the globe, sharing tales of exploration and discovery through the lens of my camera. From the serene shores of secluded beaches to the bustling streets of bustling cities, each photograph tells a story, inviting you to wanderlust alongside me. Whether you seek inspiration for your next escapade or simply crave a visual escape, let my site be your passport to wanderlust and wonder.

entry.title: First time to Highland
entry.content:
First time to Scottish Highlands

Street of Inverness

The northernmost city in the UK

Loch Ness

I didnâ€™t see the Loch Ness Monster, but the scenery by the lake was nice.


I spent the entire day before I leave by sit near the Loch and surprise the fog is come, which make the Loch Ness another view.

Urquhart Castle

A very old castle on the shores of Loch Ness. Urquhart Castle was built between the 13th and 16th centuries and was abandoned after the 17th century.

Drumnadrochit

The village I live during the trip, surrounded by good view.

Other View In Highland

A place close to the Balmacaan Deer Forest. It is a pity that I cannot enter the forest due to seasonal reasons.
